text: Hey kids.

This is the song I sing when I am 
away and alone and a little bit afraid!

I’ve come to the sea
And I’ve come very far

I’ve crossed through the desert
It’s so strange where we are

I won’t take a stop
I will not blow my top

I’ll keep on my path
Slow or fast, high or low
We go, we go, we go
Like the train on the tracks we go
Through the rain, through the storm, through the snow
We go, we go, we go!

When you’re feeling bad, remember that
today is just a fleeting moment in time.

Tomorrow will come again with a 
whole new brightness.

It’s dark in the moment
But it will be light soon

I’m gonna keep on going
Singing on this brave tune

I won’t take a stop
I will not blow my top

I will keep chugging on
Through the storm I will blow
We go, we go, we go
Like the train on the tracks we go
Through the rain, through the storm, through the snow
We go, we go, we go!
Why do we feel scared? Because of the unknown.

But remember, what we don’t know today
will be familiar to us tomorrow!

I can see all the sights
Feel the wind on my face

There’re things to enjoy
Fear is just a disgrace

I won’t let this fear
Be a cross to bear

I’ll smile cos tomorrow
I will know I will know
We go, we go, we go...
Like the train on the tracks we go
Through the rain, through the storm, through the snow...
We go, we go, we go!
Never let the fear of the unknown take you down!
Just remember what Bob the Train taught you!
